Description:
AFFORDABLE, CHARMING & INVITING!
On a generous yet manageable block the home is fronted by low brick fence that matches its classic brick facade and inside you find polished hardwood floors complementing the crisp off white paintwork perfectly. It features a vast lounge/dining room as well as an adjoining kitchen renovated with a stainless steel oven and cook top. There are 3 bedrooms and a modern bathroom with dual access toilet plus the added comforts of a gas wall heater and evaporative cooling. Outside, a long driveway leads to the single garage and the backyard is highlighted by a broad covered patio and a cubby house for the kids. Just minutes away from buses, Clayton South Primary School and Clarinda Shopping Centre, a great location only adds to its appeal.
Insights: 31 Warraweena Road, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2016 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Heaven in Bevan, Stamp Duty Savings in a Growth Area !!!!
Located in one of South Eastern Suburbs fastest growing pockets (based on land per square metre sale) is this beautiful and contemporary modern residence development.
Boasting all the modern inclusions and with a thoughtful, practical living floorplan, you will find your own slice of Heaven at 49 Bevan.
With all the convenience of Clayton Central and Springvale Central just minutes away, it will be hard to find another location that offers so much and for such great value.
ABOUT THE LOCATION:
Minutes to ...
Westall/Clayton Station
Monash University/Hospital/Children Hospital
Moorabbin Costco/Chadstone Shopping Centre
Local Primary/Secondary/Chinese Language School
CHOOSE FROM
Unit 1 (SOLD $760 000) 151.75m2 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 3 Toilets, 1 Car garage + 1 car space
Unit 2 157.44m2 3 bedrooms + 1 study, 3 bathrooms/3 Toilets, 1 Car garage + 1 car space
Unit 3 136.6m2 3/2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms + 3 Toilet 1 1/2 Car garage + 1 car space
Unit 4 155.35m2 4/3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms/3 Toilet 1 Car garage + 1 car space
Call now for further information...

Description:
This is the key to your heart!
What a great position and floor plan perfect now but still has scope to add your own touch. The home is comprised of three bedrooms (master with ensuite and walk in robe), two bathrooms, separate laundry and two living rooms. The centerpiece is the huge renovated gas appointed kitchen, exhaust canopy and meals area. Manicured front and back gardens are complemented with the huge single remote controlled garage, workshop at the rear and undercover area ideal for your family gatherings.
Other features include modern conveniences such as gas ducted heating, split system air conditioning, built in robes, rear pergola, water tanks, fernery, two storage sheds and in built BBQ. All this on the doorstep of Namatjira Park, local primary schools, bus stops and minutes away from Clarinda Shopping Centre, Clayton Central, Clayton train station and Monash University.
Disclaimer: We have in preparing this document used our best endeavours to ensure that the information contained in this document is true and accurate, but accept no responsibility and disclaim all liability in respect to any errors, omissions, inaccuracies or misstatements in this document. Prospect purchasers should make their own enquiries to verify the information contained in this document. Purchasers should make their own enquires and refer to the due diligence check-list provided by Consumer Affairs. Click on the link for a copy of the due diligence check-list from Consumer Affairs. http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Owners Must Sell- Prior Offers Considered.
Developers, builders and investors, this is the opportunity you've been looking for to fast-track your next 5-star project. Plans have been approved and permits are in place to construct 3 sublime double storey townhouses in sought-after environs. Superbly designed, the flexible open plan layouts will offer:
Unit 1 - 20.41sqs (approx) - 2 bedrooms, multi-purpose room (versatile as 3rd bed) & SLUG
Unit 2 - 20.5sqs (approx) - 2 bedrooms, multi-purpose room (versatile as 3rd bed) & SLUG
Unit 3 - 17.23sqs (approx) - 2 bedrooms, open plan kitchen/living, (possibility of a 3rd bed) & SLUG
A sound investment with current rental returns of $1,450pcm on a month to month basis, with access via the service road and walking distance to shopping, train station, bus stops and moments to Monash University, IKEA, Westall Primary and Secondary, Kindergarten and Springvale central.
*Please Note* Buxton Real Estate may refuse to provide further information about the property should you prefer not to disclose your Full Contact Details including Phone Number. Photo id required upon entering the property.

Description:
A 3 BEDROOM HOME WITH A NEW LEASE ON LIFE
Literally around the corner from central Clayton and its shops, cafes and train station, this street front unit on a block of just 2 will surely appeal to investors as much as home buyers looking for something they can add value to. The home has room for an update and features a generous lounge/dining room with polished hardwood floors, a gas heater and split system air conditioner plus a separate kitchen with upright stainless steel oven/stove. There are 3 large bedrooms that all feature built in wardrobes as well as a neat family bathroom, separate toilet and a full laundry. Outside you find a covered patio that spans the length of the home plus a fully fenced front courtyard, a rear accessed double carport and garden shed.

Description:
BEAUTIFUL AND CHARMING
This exceptional rear home opposite Keeley Park, offering a convenient location near buses, train and schools. A young and spacious unit ideal for those that are downsizing, investors or first home owners. Tiled entry with an open plan living area, stunning modern kitchen with dining , 3 bedrooms with BIR, central stylish bathroom, sun-drenched rear landscaped gardens with paved patio and double remote garage. Featuring: rain water tank supplying water to toilet and gardens, ducted heating, split system heat/cool, floating floors, dishwasher, security alarm and quality carpets. Within walking distance to Westall High School and Westall Primary School. Bright and beautiful will be your first and last impression as this is a must inspect home.
Terms 10% Dep Bal 45/60 days
Photo ID will be required for entry.Potential purchasers are required to leave their contact details with the agent at inspections.

Description:
CLASSY LIVING - AUCTION THIS SATURDAY at 12pm
Only few homes in this location will compare to this beautiful two storey house influenced by modern and traditional themes. Next to parkland and nestled in a peaceful street and surrounded by quality homes. Offering 4 bedrooms and study, master bedroom with ensuite, gracious entry leading to a formal lounge and dining room, new modern kitchen with ample room for large refrigerator, spacious renovated bathroom and laundry. Downstairs has polished hardwood flooring, split system cooling/heat, gas fireplace and storage area. Upstairs area has w/w quality carpets and LED lighting throughout. The large rear yard is ideal for those passionate entertainers and gardeners. The double lockup garage has plenty of storage with a long driveway for multiple cars. An ideal family home in this convenient location near Clayton South Primary and the Clarinda Shopping Centre. A rare find that will please most buyers. Terms 10% Dep .Bal 30/60 days

Description:
LUCKY FOR SOME!
A chance to move into this up and coming suburb and enjoy the space of 677 sq metres and a 17.8 m frontage approx. This traditional big, bright north facing home has provided family living for decades and is ready to provide more ? or provide the space for a redevelopment (STCA) so that even more people can enjoy the location. Terracotta tile roof shows the original quality and the big and bright living room brings in the morning sunshine. A traditional kitchen with meals area and a big shining 5 burner stainless steel oven is a chef?s dream. A good wide hallway separate the bedrooms, all with robes. An extra room for study or whatever, separate laundry, toilet and a big back yard with garage for one and room for plenty parking on driveway. Ideally located handy for heaps of cosmopolitan shops, Clayton train station, Monash Hospital and Clayton South Primary School with Catholic school nearby. Biggest drawcard is the dog-friendly Namatjira Park where you can walk or ride around the lake or picnic and play.
Make your move and this could be your lucky day.
For further details call Jeffrey Pha on 0403 061 098 or email jeffrey.pha@raywhite.com.

Great Family Home on a Corner Block. Endless Possibilities!
Located in one of the best pockets of Clayton South, this home is ideal for your first home or investment.
Features:
- 3 good size bedrooms with Built in Robes, Master with Walk In
- L shape formal living/dining
- Kitchen with gas cooking
- Family room overlooking large patio
- Large family bathroom
- Separate powder room
- Good size laundry
- Ducted Heating and Airconditioning Unit
- Double remote control garage
- Private yard, great for kids and entertaining
Location and Transport:
- Only minutes from Clayton Central shops and train station
- Walk to St Andrews Primary school, Namitjira park and Clarinda shopping centre
- Minutes drive to Monash University, Costco, Chadstone Shopping Centre and DFO
All this on a good size corner block of 530m2 approx. For more information call Rene on 0413 330 357

Description:
Savvy Investment In Prime Location! Not To Be Missed
The astute investor will be impressed with the generous monthly return on this spacious two bedroom apartment. The spacious rooms include BIRs with the main having a study nook, moving on to the kitchen stone bench tops, quality appointed applicances, as well as open plan living with split system A/C and heating. The large balcony offers a fantastic area for entertaining or even reading a quite book. Additional features also include security video intercom entrance, storage cage and underground carpark. Water and Gas included in the body corporate fees. Located only 100 metres from Westall station, easy access to Westall Road, Homemaker centre just stone throws away and Rosebank avenue shops just walking distance. Both primary and high schools located near entrance of this quality estate. Don't hesitate a once in a lifetime opportunity is waiting for you!

Description:
VENDOR SAYS SELL!! STUNNING MODERN OPEN PLAN HOME IN SUPERB LOCATION
www.75rosebankaveclaytonsouth.com
Situated 5 minutes walk to Westall Train Station, directly opposite to Westall SC and close to a wide variety of amenities, this stunning double storey executive home is brought to the market in excellent condition. The modern design concept, quality finishes and low-maintenance living space make this the ideal property for a first home, investment, downsize or simple change in lifestyle.
The tiled entrance will welcome guests inside, leading straight into the lounge area which connects to a spacious open plan living and dining. Fit for a chef, the modern stone benchtop kitchen features plenty of storage, stainless steel appliances and a striking glass splash back that will appeal to your style.
Ducted heating and refrigerated cooling will provide comfort all year round, while the bedrooms will serve as the ideal place to unwind after a long day.
Spacious master bedroom is located on the first floor, featuring a walk-in robe and private en suite. Two further bedrooms equipped with built in robes offer plenty of natural light and privacy. All bathrooms offer modern design tiled from floor to ceiling and include freestanding bath and showers.
Better yet, this home is in a highly desirable location. It's just a 5-minute walk to nearby Westall Train Station, 1 minute to the bus stop with routes direct to Clarinda Shopping Centre, Parkmore Shopping Centre, Clayton Station, and direct access to Princess Highway and Monash Freeway. Schools include Westall Primary School, Westall Secondary College, Clayton South Primary School, and St John Vianney's Primary school.
This family home is ready for its new owner; schedule your appointment to see it today!

Address: A212/59 Autumn Terrace Clayton South VIC 3169
Description:
Great Location!
Large one bedroom apartment being offered to those who like to live in a great location with everything at your doorstep, or for those smart investors looking for great rental returns and depreciation as the property is only 4 years old.
Comprising: designer kitchen with Bosch stainless steel appliances, stone bench tops and gas cooking, huge bedroom, large living/dining opening on to a beautiful spacious sun-filled balcony. Impressive modern bathroom with European laundry, split system heating and cooling, secure basement car park, storage cage and intercom.
Walking distance to bus stop, Post Office and local shops.
On the doorstep of Westall Train Station which will take you to:
25-30 minutes to the City
10-15 minutes to Monash University, Clayton's Monash Medical Centre and 5-10 minutes to Clayton's shopping strip.
Insights: 5 other 1 bedroom unit in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Ideal position with family floor plan!
What a great position and floor plan perfect now but still has scope to add your own touch. The home is comprised of four bedrooms, two bathrooms, separate laundry and two living rooms. The centerpiece is the huge gas appointed kitchen, exhaust canopy and meals area. Manicured front and back gardens are complemented with the huge single lockup garage.
Other features include modern conveniences such as split system air conditioning, built in robes, rear pergola, international satellite and a self contained unit in the backyard. All this on the doorstep of Namatjira Park, local primary schools, bus stops and minutes away from Clarinda Shopping Centre, Clayton Central, Clayton train station and Monash University.

Description:
Ditch The Tools ? Just Move In!
Forget about buying a home and transforming it into something you?ve seen on The Block ? just buy this fully-renovated gem that?s already had all the hard work done for you and move straight in and enjoy!
Subdivided with no shared land on a compact, easy-to-maintain 368sqm (approx.) corner block on the footsteps of Keeley Park, this single-level stunner has been cosmetically and structurally renovated in its quest to offer a superior living experience ideal for the first-time buyer, investor or empty nester with an eye for style and desire for contemporary luxury.
Sun-kissed living spaces complemented with a smartly styled kitchen (gas oven and cooktop plus plenty of bench and cupboard space) accentuates its modern character, as does the polished timber floorboards underfoot, private courtyard and sleek bathroom that services the two spacious bedrooms, both of which are equipped with built-in robes.
Climate controlled with ducted heating and two split-system units, protected by a security alarm system and complete with off-street parking, you?ll want for nothing.
With your weekends clear given there?s no need to transform into a DIY warrior, you?re free to sample the trendy eateries along the Clayton Rd and Westall Rd shopping strips. Located within moments of Clayton and Westall train stations, Monash University Clayton Campus, Monash Medical Centre, numerous parks, Clayton South Primary School, Westall Secondary College, Clayton South Child Care Centre and the Monash Freeway, this house rules!

Description:
MODERN APARTMENT IN THE HEART OF CLAYTON!
This is a unique opportunity for the investor, first home buyer or downsizer looking to buy the ideal apartment in a prominent location of Clayton.
This modern double storey two bedroom apartment offering central tiled bathroom with toilet, modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, living area adjoining with balcony, secure underground parking, air-conditioning and intercom security entrance.
Right opposite the Clayton Community Centre including a library, theatrette, pre-school, occasional care, youth and family services, maternal and child care services, café, gymnasium, meeting rooms, an indoor aquatic facility and MonashLink community health services, and walking distance to Clayton shopping precinct and Clayton train station, also short distance to Monash University, Chadstone Shopping Centre and access to Dandenong Road and Monash Freeway.
